CheckTitle: Ensure alert is configured for root account logins
Description: Ensures that an alert is configured in SLS to monitor and notify on root account login activities.
Risk: Root account has unrestricted access to all resources. Without monitoring, unauthorized root access may go undetected.

Recommendation.Text: Create and enable an alert in SLS to monitor root account login activities from ActionTrail logs.

Notes: This check looks for enabled alerts that monitor root account console or API logins.
